TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minLength1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for validating the content of changed trees got by unmarshalling of the minLength-1.xsd based XML documents or created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines an anyURI restricted SimpleType with minLength value 11. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML anyURI minLength-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minLength-1-4.xml document, sets valid values "ftp://x.gov/", "ftp://ftp.networkingint.gov/", "mailto:thosebas@withbyofinformationXSLthi.gov", "gopher://wirelesscreatedbothincludesmatcharoundindustryco.org/", "mailto:metrologya@improvedmechanismcomputingprocessWithinErrorsimagestheref.com" for the anyURI restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-anyURI-minLength-1 element and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML anyURI minLength-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minLength-1-4.xml document, sets the invalid values "", "ftp://x.g/", for the anyURI restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-anyURI-minLength-1 element and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML anyURI minLength-1.xsd, validate created content tree with valid content
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates the anyURI restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-anyURI-minLength-1 element with a valid value, sets its value to "ftp://x.gov/", "ftp://ftp.networkingint.gov/", "mailto:thosebas@withbyofinformationXSLthi.gov", "gopher://wirelesscreatedbothincludesmatcharoundindustryco.org/", "mailto:metrologya@improvedmechanismcomputingprocessWithinErrorsimagestheref.com" and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML anyURI minLength-1.xsd, validate created content tree with invalid content
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates the anyURI restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-anyURI-minLength-1 element with a valid value, sets its value to "", "ftp://x.g/", then expects validation to fail.
